nodes.text: The Star Jewel was a starship manufactured by Ubrikkian Industries that was owned by the crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure during the Imperial Era. At some prior to or during 3 ABY, Jabba's majordomo Bib Fortuna was on board the vessel when it made a layover stop on the world of Nar Haaska, where the shipjacker Bandit Billie and her crew of Taurill attempted to steal the ship.

The attempt was unsuccessful, with Billie being injured by a Gamorrean vibro-ax, but did cause superficial damage to Star Jewel's landing gear and hull plating. Knowing that Jabba would notice the damage, Fortuna had the ship's course changed to the world of Keldooine to be repaired at the Keldooine Starshipwrights. Enroute, he made note of the attempted theft in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide, which he had taken from Billie and intended to judge the value of while traveling.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Star Jewel was introduced in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace. The ship originated in Star Wars Legends, where it was created for the 1995 video game Star Wars: Dark Forces.
